charges.charge_disposition: Deft is Committed to The Custody of The Bureau of Prisons For A Term of 6 Months; The Court Recommends That Deft Serve His Term of Incarceration at A Halfway House; The Cost of Incarceration Fee is Waived. Upon Release From Imprisonment, Deft Shall be Placed on Supervised Release For A Term of 2 Years With Standard And Special Conditions. Deft Shall Comply With The Conditions of Home Detention Which Will be Monitored by an Electronic Monitoring System For A Period of 6 Months. Deft Shall Wear (An) Electronic Monitoring Device(S) And Follow Electronic Monitoring Procedures Specified by His Probation Officer as Outlined in Probation Form 61. Deft Shall Pay A Portion or The Total Cost of Electronic Monitoring Services at The Daily Rate Provided by Uspo. The Daily Rate And Payment Schedule Are Subject to Periodic Adjustments by Uspo. no Fine. Deft to Pay $100.00 Mandatory Assessment, Due Immediately. The Court Grants Voluntary Surrender. The Court Grants The Govt's Motion to Dismiss Complaint No. 09-Mj-2081 as to This Deft.
